subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Access to GPT-4o with usage limits up to ~80 messages every 3 hours; other limits for older models apply.
Available via ChatGPT Plus but with lower priority and usage caps compared to GPT-4o.
5x more usage than the free tier, with higher capacity for conversations and larger file uploads.
Included in Pro usage limits; prioritized access over free tier.
Access to Gemini 1.5 Pro and 1.0 Ultra models via Google One AI Premium plan.
Available via the Gemini Advanced subscription.

llama_3_models.note: Models are free to download and run. Cost is determined by self-hosting or managed service providers (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) where pricing varies.

copilot_pro.features: Priority access to latest models (GPT-4 Turbo), during peak times, image creation with DALL-E 3, and deeper integration into Microsoft 365 apps.

copilot_for_m365.features: Full integration into Microsoft 365 apps (Teams, Word, Excel, etc.) with enterprise-grade data security and compliance.

pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price war and drive towards efficiency. Newer models (like GPT-4o, Gemini 1.5 Flash) are significantly cheaper than their predecessors. Pay-per-use is becoming extremely competitive, especially from Chinese open-source labs (DeepSeek, Qwen), while $20/month has become the standard subscription price for premium consumer access.
